name: RedPanda Delivery
description:
You and your drone compete to see who can deliver the most packages in this short but decently re-playable game!

You are a mail delivery man that works for the RPD (Red Panda Delivery), the RPD (Red Panda Delivery) has state of the art drone tech, that is designed to find the optimal path, so you and your drone partner H.E.C.T.O.R work together to deliver packages, but you like to make a little game of it by seeing who can deliver the most!

Who will win?
man or machine?

-controls-

Left/Right arrow keys to move.

Up arrow key to go in stairs door

and that's it!

This is my first game jam game, and it was made in a total of 24h, the UI is a bit rough, I was running low on time.

-Credits-
Music by: Quaffy
Programming by: Quaffy
Art by: Quaffy
Literally everything by: Quaffy
